name: cindy gregson
review: A warm and inviting congregation where the Word of God is faithfully taught. I was pleased to note quite a number of young people in attendance.

name: JOANNE RIENHARDT
review: Very friendly, Bible based message made relevant to current life.

review: A wonderful, straightforward place of worship. I always leave there spiritually fulfilled.

review: Hope is a Bible teaching Church
